text: Jorge Zavala Baquerizo (13 May 1921 - 9 May 2014) was an Ecuadorian politician. He served as the Vice President of Ecuador from 1968 to 1970 under the José María Velasco Ibarra administration. He was a member of the Ecuadorian Radical Liberal Party. Zavala died in Guayaquil, Ecuador from natural causes, aged 92. ==References== Category:1921 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Vice presidents of Ecuador Category:Politicians from Guayaquil
title: Jorge Zavala
